p.i: A black, velvet square of cloth that unfolds into a wide circle.

description.p: Benefit. The Portable Hole folds open on a flat surface into a 6-foot wide, 6-foot deep hole. It has 20 gear slots of storage. The hole closes when you fold the cloth into a small square.
Curse. Placing this item inside a Bag of Holding or another Portable Hole destroys both items and all held inside them.
